sections.heading: from liability.Law enforcement officials, their employees, and state officials shall be immune from liability for good faith conduct under the Sex Offender Registration Act

sections.text:
29-4012.Immunity from liability.

Law enforcement officials, their employees, and state officials shall be immune from liability for good faith conduct under the Sex Offender Registration Act.

SourceLaws 1996, LB 645, ยง 12.
